flawed_nl_solution:
There are 60 x 1/6 = <<60*1/6=360/1>>360/1 blue chips.
There are 360/1 + 34 = <<360/1+34=394>>394 chips that are not green.
Thus, 60 - 394 = <<60-394=-334>>-334 chips are green.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10, not 360/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
